mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT `menu`.perm_key FROM `user_role` LEFT JOIN `role` ON role.id = user_role.role_id LEFT JOIN `role_menu` ON user_role.role_id = role_menu.role_id LEFT JOIN `menu` ON menu.id = role_menu.menu_id WHERE `user_role`.user_id = #{userId} AND role.`status` = 1 AND `menu`.`status` = 1
